english.segment1: I stand before You Lord. And give You all my praise. Your love is all I need. Jesus, You're all I need
english.segment2: My life belongs to You. You gave Your life for me. Your grace is all I need. Jesus, You're all I need
english.segment3: Hold me in Your arms. Never let me go. I want to spend eternity with You
english.segment4: And now that You're near. Everything is different. Everything's so different, Lord. And I know I'm not the same. My life You've changed. I want to be with You. I want to be with You
english.segment5: I will sing for You always. 'Cause in Your presence, Lord. Is where I want to stay always
